page_content:
Instrument Data Summaries

Version:MissionOS_2.0

Alarm Activity is represented in the Dashboard under New instruments in AAA.

You can choose different periods of time to view the information required. Three timing statuses are as follows:

  • Since last log-in – select this button to view alarm activity since the last login.
  • Past 24 hours – select this button to view the alarm activity in the last 24 hours.
  • Past Week - select this button to view the alarm activity for the past week.
